ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Quote to go to Technical Feasibility or Solution Design Stages if the Type of Quote is GSM
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(PNG_QuoteType__c = 'GSM', RecordType.Name = 'Digicel PNG Draft Quote', ISCHANGED ( Status ), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status , 'In Technical Feasibility Check'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Technical Feasibility Rejected'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Technical Feasibility Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'In Solution Review'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Solution Approved'), ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Solution Rejected'))) ,TRUE,FAlSE)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: GSM Quotes do not require Technical Feasibility or Solution Design Approvals
